Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Kyle Flood agreed to replace Greg Schiano as the Rutgers football coach after Florida International’s Mario Cristobal reportedly turned down an offer.
snippet: Kyle Flood agreed to replace Greg Schiano as the Rutgers football coach after Florida International’s Mario Cristobal reportedly turned down an offer.
